body.p: The Communication Unit coordinates and initiates contact with the media and the rest of society, and deals with matters relating to communication within the Ministry.
The Department of Local Government is responsible for implementing local government policy.
The Department of Planning and Administrative Affairs

The overall objective of the Department of Planning and Administrative Affairs is to ensure the efficient operation and administration of the Ministry and the coordination of cross-sectoral research and development.
The Department of Regional Development is responsible for monitoring the Norwegian government’s rural and regional policy.
The Housing and Building Department is responsible for implementing the government’s housing and building policy.
